sys_script.name: Set Snapshot Scratchpad

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_324db9dfeb79421036e7f734bad0cdc6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_pb_core_snapshot</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set Snapshot Scratchpad</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	const photoboothName = current.request.photobooth.name;
	const requestSysId = current.request.getUniqueValue();
	
	g_scratchpad.previewUrl = `/now/photobooth/results/${photoboothName}/${requestSysId}/0`;
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jon.lind</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-01 15:45:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>324db9dfeb79421036e7f734bad0cdc6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Snapshot Scratchpad</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Photobooth App" source="x_snc_pb_app">baa73cb74742dd10552caf52736d43f1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Photobooth App">baa73cb74742dd10552caf52736d43f1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_324db9dfeb79421036e7f734bad0cdc6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jon.lind</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 15:55:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=324db9dfeb79421036e7f734bad0cdc6"/></record_update>
